idea:
Social Enterprise with a unique approach to imparting Transformative Learning, Mindfulness, and Life Coaching to masses in Mumbai, for their well-being & strengthening the social fabric.

Shepherd (चरवाहा, गड़ेरिया, ग्वाला) means a person whose job is to take care of sheep and move them from one place to another. It also means all below.

1. to make a group of people move to where you want them to go, especially in a kind, helpful, and careful way:

2. to lead people somewhere

3. guide or direct in a particular direction.

Shepherds in Mumbai in the context would mean qualified Life Coaches, Mindfulness Teachers (or similar profiles) in and around Mumbai who guides people of Mumbai during trouble/tough situations in life otherwise for a positive effect on psychological well-being
name: SHEPHERDS IN MUMBAI LIFE COACHING (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are creating a E-Sports Gaming Company. There are 100 Million E Sports fans in India.  We want to create a product to enable them to access international gaming market smoother and faster. This is expected to be the fastest growing tech start-up vertical this year in world.
name: FanBuff ESports

idea: We want to build a E-sports product that caters to 100 Million ESports fans in India. We want to build globally scalable product that is futuristic to the gaming world of today! We want to allow fans of E-Sports to be able to play online tournaments etc between themselves and make a living of it.
name: FANBUFF ESPORTS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We aim at bringing complete automation in the investment process in India, bring down the minimum amount needed necessary to be made while making investments, in which case their diversification is also not possible which will also be a key advantage of our platform 


In brief- a platform that completely automate investments accordingly (from the stage of adding money to the wallet) by knowing the risk profile of the investors on the scale of 1 to 5 and diversifying their money into various investment portfolios like government bonds, treasuries, corporate bonds, small company stocks, large company stalks, real estate, foreign company stocks, etc.
name: GetAsssetGo

idea: A Loyalty Program giving the benefits to the members for double the amount of membership fees without any further spend
name: Fortune Card

idea: We do mainly Government Constructions like, constructions of Roads, Canals, Bridges. The construction sector is visualized to play a powerful role in economic growth, in addition to producing structures that adds to productivity and quality of life.
name: Vishnu Ashruji Sonune

idea:
Hacktify Cyber Security imparts professional Trainings and Consulting in the field of Cyber Security and Ethical Hacking.

We Provide trainings based on Industry Standards and requirements which are aligned with 100% practical exposure towards Industry.

We provide trainings in Web Application Security Testing, Mobile Application Security Testing, Network Security Testing, Cloud Security Testing and IT Infrastructure and System Security.
name: HACKTIFY CYBER SECURITY LLP

idea: Bachelor in Commerce (Accounts and Finance). CA Final
name: shrujay

idea:
Techmandala provides Retailers and Brands with “Retail Automation as a Service” that enables them to run their businesses efficiently, directly contributing to their revenue and profit. Powered by state-of-the-art technologies, we provide easily consumable everyday automation and actionable insights by analyzing key data points to help businesses make smarter decisions. 


At Techmandala we deliver blazing fast, highly secure, reliable and predictable products at scale. Every day, we choose to address some of the hardest software engineering problems that exist. While we enjoy a joyful pride in the quality of the applications we produce and the camaraderie that abounds in our team due to our collective successes, our primary purpose is to ensure that our customers take delight in using the apps we produce and that it keeps their businesses flourishing, safe and continuously creating value to help them succeed.
name: TECHMANDALA SOLUTIONS LLP
